definition: to stick/to paste/to post (e.g. on a blog)/to keep close to/to fit snugly/to subsidize/allowance (e.g. money for food or housing)/sticker/classifier for sticking plaster: strip
to draw/picture/painting/CL:幅[fu2],張|张[zhang1]/classifier for paintings etc/variant of 劃|划[hua4]

sentences.english: What does the stick figure man in the diagram represent?
sentences.chinese: 图中的剪贴画小人代表什么？

sentences.english: Our clip tips help you use our free clip art most effectively.
sentences.chinese: 阅读我们的剪辑提示有助于更有效地使用剪贴画。

sentences.english: Enable Ss to realize the features of the cloth paste pictures.
sentences.chinese: 使学生初步了解布贴画的形式特点。

sentences.english: Get some artwork or a poster to make your wall a little more visually interesting.
sentences.chinese: 放一些艺术品或招贴画到墙上使它看起来更有趣一点。

sentences.english: A vision board can be a wallpaper or collage of everything you want in life.
sentences.chinese: 你可以在愿望板上贴满你理想中生活的墙纸或者贴画。

sentences.english: Stores should display posters showing pottery that is designed to appeal to college-age individuals.
sentences.chinese: 商店应该张贴能够吸引在校年龄人群的陶器的招贴画。

sentences.english: In 1912, they began to experiment with collage and papier collé.
sentences.chinese: 1912年，他们开始做抽象拚贴画和纸贴画。

sentences.english: In 1912, they began to experiment with collage and papier collé.
sentences.chinese: 1912年，他们开始做抽象拚贴画和纸贴画。

sentences.english: Twenty-two children gave away more than one sticker.
sentences.chinese: 有二十二名儿童愿意把多于一张的贴画分给别人。

sentences.english: Some require royalties for commercial use.
sentences.chinese: 一些剪贴画需要商业使用版税。

sentences.english: What do you think of these stickers?
sentences.chinese: 你认为这些贴画怎么样？

sentences.english: PhotoCaps - Best App for Captions, Labels, Clipart on your photos.
sentences.chinese: 最佳标题，标签应用程序，对您的照片剪贴画。

sentences.english: He decoupaged several maps on the walls.
sentences.chinese: 他把几张地图当剪贴画贴在墙上。

sentences.english: Do not use clipart under any circumstances.
sentences.chinese: 任何情况下都不要用剪贴画。

definition: papercutting (Chinese folk art)/to make paper cutouts
